Farmer

A person who produces food for self, society, nation and world; should be INDEPENDENT

Every one who  consumes without producing, always has to be Thank full to farmer.

Quotes says; Farmer is BackBone of Society, Farmer is King. If there is no farmer; there is no people, no nation, none exists.

Read More

Agriculture

Agriculture is the art and science of cultivating the soil, growing crops and raising livestock. It includes the preparation of plant and animal products for people. Agriculture was the key development in the rise of sedentary human civilization, Hence a Noble Profession

Read More

Integrated Agriculture

For Better Tomorrow, Farmer's agriculture has to adopt Cultivation of each and every essential commodities like Paddy, Wheat, Grains, Vegetables and what not; with intigration of Nature; not to procure from outside resources, at least for them self and their village purpose.

Read More

Previous Next

Step into the World of Farmer!

Let the first step be firmly anchored!

Farmer's agriculture is getting affected by Green House Effect, Global Warming, Climate Change. Hence has to look after those factors accordingly has to change to rebuilding of exhausting things to make his surrounding comfortable for self sustaining life.

Global Warming

Farmers surroundings for work i.e. agriculture; should be cool, calm and courageous, hence to live and let live. At Present times; Present practice of farming misleading in awareness about balance between plants, trees, crops, creatures around farming fields. Hence Green House Effect is causing Global Warming.

Biodiversity

Farming practices should change and farmers should think innovative to invent their own practices according their surrounding. Hence has to learn from facing failures and adopt new methods, techniques to create their way of farming for their life and future generations security before farming will disappear

Ecosystem

Air, Water, Sun(light), Earth and Sky; the five elements of Atmosphere has to be used by a farmer in agriculture. Has to be think more & more to involve in farming ; they are related to nature to do more without interference of farmer where there will be no disturbances to cause & there by system will be saved.

Jadav Payeng

Forest Man

Forests help to cool down the earth through their role in water evaporation , which creates clouds that reflect back sunlight. The forest creates fresh water runoff for the streams and rivers,  and helps pull rainfall in coastal areas inland.  In India, deforestation has caused a 30% drop in rainfall.

CHEMICAL FARMING

Agricultural practice of Chemical Farming is mostly with Synthetic Chemicals, usage is not as recommended, hence cant say whether it is safe or not to consume.

ORGANIC FARMING

Cultivation of Crops in Organic Farming is safe; but for cultivation there farmer is not able to get input as farming requirement needed and facing problems.

NATURAL FARMING

Everything can be prepared by farmer for Natural Farming cultivation practice with things that are in their surroundings; with cow base can do at least 10 acres

Indian Farmer Integrated Development Co-operative Organisation is a wing of SRI Associations. As name indicates work for Farmers and Agriculture.
